AI Description: D-Bus is a message bus system, a simple way for applications to talk to one another. In addition to interprocess communication, D-Bus helps coordinate process lifecycle management.
Core Features: 1. Interprocess communication between applications. 2. Coordination of process lifecycle management. 3. Suitable for use in both small and large systems. 4. Enables communication between applications written in different programming languages.
General Tags: Message Bus System, Interprocess Communication, Process Lifecycle Management
